flawed_nl_solution:
One day, 2000-500=<<2000-500=1050>>1050 cans of food were left.
It was then restocked to 1050+1500=<<1050+1500=2550>>2550 cans.
1000*2=<<1000*2=2000>>2000 cans were taken the next day.
2550-2000=<<2550-2000=550>>550 cans were left.
It was restocked once more to 550+3000=<<550+3000=3550>>3550 cans of food.
Carla gave away 500+2000=<<500+2000=2500>>2500 cans of food.
#### 2500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 1050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
